MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA16 postcode area of Greenock. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:00am due to an underground cable fault in Cumberland Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:45am on Thursday, 19 November 2020
